{{lb|gmw-cfr|southern|_|Moselle Franconian}} [[song]] ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|liet}}, from {{inh|de|goh|liod||song, lay, singing}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*leuþą||song}}. . ===Pronunciation=== * {{a|Austria}} {{IPA|de|/ˈliːt/}} * {{rhymes|de|iːt}} * {{homophones|de|Lid|lieht}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Lied.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Lied.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Liedes|gen2=Lieds|Lieder|Liedchen|dim2=Liedlein}} #
